title: BTRBT
subtitle: This so-called "hot take" is literally just an anecdote of a refugee of communism saying she had to flee Cuba at 15, so the state wouldn't abduct her from her family, and send her to study in the USSR. Sometimes socialists are just beyond parody. pic.twitter.com/Ap3llRSSmx

title: Annika H Rothstein
subtitle: Passed down from my grandfather to my father and now to me is this medal given by the Kingdom of Denmark to my grandfather Uno Nathan after the war for his work with Folke Bernadotte, rescuing Jewish refugees from Denmark to Sweden. It’s good to have things to live up to  pic.twitter.com/W4jdquDAY4
